question: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.After being involved in an accident, you were looked after by a person you did not know before. Write a special thank you letter to express your gratitude.In your letter:Introduce yourself and let him/her know why you are writingExpress your appreciationAnd offer him/ her to visit your home with this family.You do NOT need to write any address.You should write at least 150 words
text: I am the girl who had that accident  last Thursday, and I am writing this letter to thank you for your significant help. In addition, I will be very glad if you accept my request to share a dinner with you at my home this weekend.

First, I want to introduce myself. My name is China Tarhini and I am a civil engineer. That day, I was heading to visit a site when I was exposed to an accident on the main road. However, after getting to the hospital, the nurse informed me that a brave man saved me from the fire that hit my car and brought me to the medical centre.
Honestly, I heavily appreciate your aid. Also, I want to thank you for your brave attitude when you rescued your life to save mine. In fact, I am in debt for you for my whole life.
Therefore, I am requesting you and your family to visit my home if  is it possible. Hopefully, you could accept my invitation.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
